entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 early in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 11 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with a few flurries after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to 11 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
